Deficiency Narrative:
During the course of the investigation, it was reported that staff sat on a childs lungs and belly during a restraint. 
Three children interviewed corroborated the child's statement.
Correction Narrative:
Effective Immediately: Staff that were involved in the incident was given a refresher immediately for 4 hours. Moving forward, all training will include demonstrations scenarios to avoid inappropriate restraint techniques. During the new hire orientation and quarterly trainings, the CPI instructor will real time scenarios during trainings to ensure the direct care staff is comfortable with the technique The CPI instructor will give the direct care staff a certificate upon completion of the training.

On 8/26/24 RCCR conducted in-person interviews with youth in care to the operation EBI techniques.

Deficiency Narrative:
During the course of the investigation, a child in care reported not being able to breathe during a restraint involving staff sitting on them. The child reported breathing heavily once released.  
Three children interviewed also reported hearing the child say they could not breathe.
Correction Narrative:
Effective Immediately: Staff that were involved in the incident was given a refresher immediately for 4 hours. Moving forward, all training will include demonstrations scenarios to avoid inappropriate 
restraint techniques. During the new hire orientation and quarterly trainings, the CPI instructor will real time scenarios during trainings to ensure the direct care staff is comfortable with the technique The CPI instructor will give the direct care staff a certificate upon completion of the training. 

On 8/26/24 RCCR conducted in-person interviews with youth in care to the operation EBI techniques.

Deficiency Narrative: The operation did not provide a requested medication log after multiple requests.
Correction Narrative: The LCCA and Administrative Assistant will review and track the medication logs at least three days out of the week to identify any patterns or concerns and to ensure the logs are filled out correct and complete by the staff member that will be administering the meds. The direct care staff members will take a refresher course on completing the med logs in its entirety.  The class will be completed by July 16, 2024.

Deficiency Narrative: The operation provided medication logs for the month of November that do not contain consistent information.
Correction Narrative: medication logs at least three days out of the week to identify any patterns or concerns and to ensure the logs are filled out correct and complete by the staff member that will be administering the meds. The direct care staff members will take a refresher course on completing the med logs in its entirety.  The class will be completed by July 16, 2024.

Deficiency Narrative: Several staff members failed to complete required training prior to being counted in ratio.
Correction Narrative: During the new hire orientation, the LCCA will monitor all trainings to ensure the direct care staff is completing all trainings before they are being counted in the ratio.  The LCCA will have the direct care staff to sign a training roster for all trainings.  The LCCA have created a new training log to include the 40 hours of supervision training before a staff member is allowed to be in the ratio. The supervisor and LCCA will sign off on the training log and a copy will be placed in the direct care staff employee binder.

Deficiency Narrative: One of three youth files reviewed did not contain a signature by the PLSP on the most recent service plan.
Correction Narrative: An email was received from the operation that included an updated service plan for the youth which included the PLSP's signature. A corrective action plan was also included in the email that indicated the operation will be responsible for ensuring all service plans are signed accordingly moving forward.

Deficiency Narrative: One out of three employee files reviewed only contained 34 annual training hours instead of the required 50 hours.
Correction Narrative: An email was received from the operation that included the training log for the employee indicating all required training hours had been completed.

Deficiency Narrative: The administrator did not have all required annual trainings.
Correction Narrative: An email was received from the operation that included verification of the missing training for the administrator. A corrective action plan was also included in the email that indicated the operation will be responsible for ensuring all trainings will be completed timely moving forward.

Deficiency Narrative: Two out of four youth files reviewed did not include known contrindications to restraints for the youth.
Correction Narrative: An email was received from the operation that included the missing information included on an admission assessment for the youth. A corrective action plan was also included in the email that indicated the operation will complete an audit of all current files to include the information and the information has been added to their admission assessment template for future use.

Deficiency Narrative: One out of four youth files reviewed did not contain all required documentation detailing a youth's discharge.
Correction Narrative: An email was received from the operation that included the missing discharge summary for the youth. A corrective action plan was also included in the email that indicated the operation will be responsible for ensuring they are completed timely moving forward.

Deficiency Narrative: A caregiver took five children in care, ages 9-13, to see a horror movie rated PG-13. Several of these children have history of self-harm and have experienced significant trauma. One childs Conservatorship worker stated that due to her diagnosis, her mindset is much younger than her age.
Correction Narrative: A follow up was completed by interviewing youth in care at school. The youth interviewed indicated they are not allowed to watch scary movies or shows at the operation, and it should be rated PG. They denied watching non-PG shows or movies since the last incident. The interviews can be viewed in Chronology.

Deficiency Narrative: During an inspection at the operation, scissors were observed to be accessible in a drawer to youth in care recently after an incident involving scissors occurred with a youth at the operation.
Correction Narrative: Corrected.
